nodes.text: Grand General was a military rank of the Galactic Empire, very highly placed within the Imperial Army or Stormtrooper Corps.

Grand General was equivalent to the Imperial Navy rank of Grand Admiral. While the rank of Grand Admiral was borne by a college of twelve leading officers distinguished by white uniforms, the most famous of them being Mitth'raw'nuruodo, the only known example of a Grand General is Malcor Brashin, and there is no evidence that he wore anything other than the standard olive uniform of a line officer.
Only a handful of Grand Generals were appointed, and the position was mainly an honorific.
